eventDecorators.name: MinterChanged
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when the minter address is changed.

eventDecorators.name: RecyclerChanged
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when the minter address is changed.

functionDecorators.name: allowance
functionDecorators.description: Get the number of tokens `spender` is approved to spend on behalf of `account`.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the account holding the funds.

parameterDecorators.name: spender
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the account spending the funds.

functionDecorators.name: approve
functionDecorators.description: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src`. This will overwrite the approval amount for `spender` and is subject to issues noted [here](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20#approve).

parameterDecorators.name: spender
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the account which may transfer tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: rawAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The number of tokens that are approved (2^256-1 means infinite).

returnDecorators.description: Whether or not the approval succeeded.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Get the number of tokens held by the `account`.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the account to get the balance of.

functionDecorators.name: decimals
functionDecorators.description: EIP-20 token decimals for this token.

parameterDecorators.name: dst
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the destination account.

functionDecorators.name: mintCap
functionDecorators.description: Cap on the percentage of totalSupply that can be minted at each mint.

functionDecorators.name: minter
functionDecorators.description: Address which may mint new tokens.

functionDecorators.name: mintingAllowedAfter
functionDecorators.description: The timestamp after which minting may occur.

functionDecorators.name: name
functionDecorators.description: EIP-20 token name for this token.

functionDecorators.name: recycler
functionDecorators.description: Address which can recive burn coin.

parameterDecorators.name: minter_
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new minter.

parameterDecorators.name: recycler_
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new recycler.

functionDecorators.name: symbol
functionDecorators.description: EIP-20 token symbol for this token.

functionDecorators.name: totalSupply
functionDecorators.description: Total number of tokens in circulation.

parameterDecorators.name: dst
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the destination account.

parameterDecorators.name: rawAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The number of tokens to transfer.

returnDecorators.description: Whether or not the transfer succeeded.
